prompts: Create a fire-type Pokemon with bright red fur and fierce yellow accents.
I want an energetic Pokemon that looks like it can shoot flames.
Generate a creature that embodies the heat of a volcano with a playful grin.
Make a fire-type Pokemon with oversized ears and a mischievous expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in rocky terrains, radiating fiery colors.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a playful yet powerful creature from the mountains.
Give me a vivid depiction of a fire Pokemon with a robust body and fiery personality.
